p: The introduction of antiretroviral therapy (ART) has led to a reduced incidence and improved survival of epidemic KS globally. [ 5] However, despite combination antiretroviral therapy, epidemic KS is still highly prevalent with high mortality rates world-wide, and especially in sub-Saharan Africa. [ 6] Between 2008 and 2013, the University Teaching Hospital (UTH) in Zambia recorded at least 726 incident KS cases, majority of which were HIV-associated. [ 7]
